ENGLISH: Direct immigration adds two new province buildings to the game. The province selector determines where pops will move from and the immigrator determines where pops will move to. Adjust decisions to choose whether you move primary, accepted, non accepted pops to other states or colonies.
Explain me how this works again?
End the Immigration Campaign, this will remove all the buildings and migration will revert to normal.

We have began forcibly removing certain parts of our population from one region to another. There is a great deal of confusion, violence and conflict caused by government disruption of normal life in this state.

You can only build a maximum of five province selectors at any one time. Going over the limit will delete any surplus buildings. Unfortunately, this event may unavoidably spam if you have province selectors in construction, it will continue to do sountil your extra province selectors are built and can be cleared by the game.
